Interface ExperienceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Experience, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Experience, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Experience>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Experience, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Experience, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Experience, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Experience>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Experience, Long>
public interface ExperienceRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Experience, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Experience>
Repository interface for Experience entities. Provides custom queries for retrieving and managing interview experiences.
Since:
2025-10-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Venkatesh K

  • Method Details

    • findByIdWithRounds

      @Query(" SELECT e\n FROM Experience e\n LEFT JOIN FETCH e.rounds\n WHERE e.id = :id\n") Optional<Experience> findByIdWithRounds(@Param("id") Long id)
      Finds an experience by its ID and eagerly fetches its associated rounds.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to find
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the experience if found, or empty if not found

    • findAllWithRounds

      @Query(" SELECT DISTINCT e\n FROM Experience e\n LEFT JOIN FETCH e.rounds\n") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Experience> findAllWithRounds(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds all experiences with their associated rounds, with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      pageable - Pagination information
      Returns:
      A page of experiences with their rounds

    • findByIdAndUserId

      @Query(" SELECT e\n FROM Experience e\n WHERE e.id = :id\n AND e.user.id = :userId\n") Optional<Experience> findByIdAndUserId(@Param("id") Long id, @Param("userId") Long userId)
      Finds an experience by its ID and the ID of the user who owns it.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to find
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the experience
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the experience if found and owned by the user

    • findByUserId

      @Query(" SELECT e\n FROM Experience e\n LEFT JOIN FETCH e.rounds\n WHERE e.user.id = :userId\n") List<Experience> findByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Finds all experiences for a specific user, including their rounds.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      A list of experiences with their rounds for the specified user

    • searchExperiences

      @Query(" SELECT e\n FROM Experience e\n WHERE (:companyName IS NULL OR LOWER(e.companyName) LIKE LOWER(concat('%', :companyName,'%')))\n AND (:jobRole IS NULL OR LOWER(e.jobRole) LIKE LOWER(concat('%', :jobRole,'%')))\n AND (:jobType IS NULL OR e.jobType = :jobType)\n AND (:finalVerdict IS NULL OR e.finalVerdict = :finalVerdict)\n") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Experience> searchExperiences(@Param("companyName") String companyName, @Param("jobRole") String jobRole, @Param("jobType") JobType jobType, @Param("finalVerdict") FinalVerdict finalVerdict, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Searches for experiences based on various criteria with pagination support. All parameters are optional - if a parameter is null, it is not included in the search criteria.
      Parameters:
      companyName - The company name to search for (case-insensitive partial match)
      jobRole - The job role to search for (case-insensitive partial match)
      jobType - The type of job to filter by
      finalVerdict - The final verdict to filter by
      pageable - Pagination information
      Returns:
      A page of experiences matching the search criteria

    • deleteByIdAndUserId

      void deleteByIdAndUserId(Long id, Long userId)
      Deletes an experience by its ID and the ID of the user who owns it.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to delete
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the experience

    • existsByIdAndUserId

      boolean existsByIdAndUserId(Long id, Long userId)
      Checks if an experience with the given ID exists and is owned by the specified user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the experience to check
      userId - The ID of the user to verify ownership
      Returns:
      true if the experience exists and is owned by the user, false otherwise

    • findByUser

      @Query(" SELECT e\n FROM Experience e\n LEFT JOIN FETCH e.rounds\n WHERE e.user = :user\n") List<Experience> findByUser(@Param("user") User user)
      Finds all experiences for a specific user, including their rounds.
      Parameters:
      user - The user entity
      Returns:
      A list of experiences with their rounds for the specified user
